channel.title: Ip ban command

item.title: Ip ban command
item.dc:creator: @ak226688 ak226688
item.description:
@ak226688 wrote:

heres my command

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ak268”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“I Herd Cows”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Duff Duff”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Chris”))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS FUCKING IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }

[/code]

wen i compile i get an error about that appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);

its something to do with that please help

ty

Read full topic
